questions.text:
What will be the output of the following:
alert(new Array(4));

What will be the output of the following:
alert(Number.MAX_VALUE + 100 - Number.MAX_VALUE);

What will be the output of the following:
alert(Infinity - Infinity);

What will be the output of the following:
alert(true / 2 + false - 3);

What will be the output of the following:
alert(!new Array(4)[3] || true==false);

What will be the output of the following:
alert(!!1==false==!!!true==-100+101);

What will be the output of the following:
var a, b;
alert(a + b);

What will be the output of the following:
var a = 5, a = a - a + 5;
alert(a == (a = 6));

What will be the output of the following:
var a = 5;
alert((a == a + 1 - 1) *
(a == a - 1) + a);

What will be the output of the following:
alert(typeof(Array));

What will be the output of the following:
alert(typeof(null));

What will be the output of the following:
alert(5 + 5 - '' + 5 + '');

What will be the output of the following:
alert((2,5 - 1) * 2);
What is the extention of a JavaScript file?

Is the following true or false?
JavaScript and Java are very similar programming languages

Is the following true or false?
JavaScript is a trademark of Oracle Corporation

Is the following true or false?
JavaScript is a weakly typed language
answers: We can decide it ourselves at runtime

questions.text:
Is the following true or false?
JavaScript is used only for the client-side

Is the following true or false?
JavaScript is implemented in the same way in all the browsers

Is the following true or false?
JavaScript can remove the <html> tag
from the document page
answers: Depends on the web page type

introText:
Sometimes Winter evenings are getting too cold and the warmth in our hearts starts to fade away... 

 In times like these all that we need is a drop of light, the spring sun that will chase away the cold and blue feelings. 

 This JavaScript quiz was made in the name of Spring. Every correct answer will give a bit of warm JavaScript energy to the dying flower of life that is our only hope for bringing Spring back...

Hurry up, with every xxxxxx seconds Winter steals 1 percent from the life energy. And we need at least 75% of energy...
